name: The Last Quest
description:
⚔ The Last Quest  ⚔ Features:
  • 1 or more quests!
  • 100x100 meters open-world
  • Outdated jokes
  • 20+ enemies and weapons that are almost the same!!!
  • Dizziness inducing camera
Follow me on Twitter: @SamberoDev

Devlog coming soon! Probably.
